main event: An observer in Springfield, Ohio sighted a bright light changing colors and disappearing when the automobile light was turned off on November 13, 1967.
interesting points: The observer estimated the distance of the light to be 1.5 to 2 miles away., The object changed colors from white to pink to orange to green., The estimated size of the object was between 250 to 350 feet., The object emitted no sound and followed the observer's vehicle for a short distance., The observation lasted for approximately 10 minutes.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
witness description: observer from the Springfield Police Department
